question.title: IntelliJ IDEA not including com.mysql.jdbc.Driver on artifact
question.body:
I'm making a program that requires connection to MySQL database. When I tried to run my generated .jar file, it shows following error:

No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://<my_ip>:3306/mydb

So I added the following line on my program

Enumeration<Driver> drivers = DriverManager.getDrivers();
    while (drivers.hasMoreElements()) {
        System.out.println("Loaded driver: " + drivers.nextElement().getClass().getName());
    }

Here's the result if I run my program directly from IntelliJ

Loaded driver: net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver
Loaded driver: com.mysql.jdbc.Driver

and here's running from my terminal

> java -jar myprogram.jar

Loaded driver: net.sourceforge.jtds.jdbc.Driver
2025-03-06 14:42:24.924 | No suitable driver found for jdbc:mysql://<my_ip>:3306/mydb

Notice that it missing com.mysql.jdbc.Driver and I've loaded mysql-connector jar file. Where do I go wrong?

Here's my IntelliJ settings:
